desc: An audio recording of the 2023-03-15 political events, including speeches, interviews, and debates.

sttData.content: The President of the United States speaks about the economy and foreign policy.
sttData.speaker: President Biden

sttData.content: A senator from California discusses her proposed legislation and receives questions from the press.
sttData.speaker: Senator Harris

sttData.content: The House Speaker discusses ongoing negotiations and upcoming deadlines.
sttData.speaker: House Speaker Pelosi

stt.sttSummary: This recording features speeches and interviews from President Biden, Senator Harris, and House Speaker Pelosi, discussing the economy, foreign policy, proposed legislation, and ongoing negotiations.
